field.name: Locked
field.description: If the lock is currently locked or not.

parameter.name: Locked
parameter.description: If the lock should be locked (true) or unlocked (false).

controlParameters.comment: **Note**: A device implementing this lock interface as well as `urn:nfi:iot:hi:security:door:*` or `urn:nfi:iot:hi:security.window.*`, is allowed to reject a lock request if the corresponding door or window is in an open state. This is done by returning a corresponding error message if an `iq` stanza is used or by simply ignoring the command if a message stanza is used.
